machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
;------- T0 End Gcode ------- 
T0 
G0 X{prime_tower_position_x} Y{prime_tower_position_y} 
G91             ;Relative positioning 
G1 E-4  F12000  ;Pull 4mm 
G1 E3   F12000  ;Push 3mm 
G1 E-30 F12000  ;Unload 
G1 E-80 F6000 
T1 
G1 E80 F3000    ;Load 
G1 E20 F2000 
G1 E11 F1000 
G90             ;Absolute positioning 
;------- T0 End Gcode -------
